name: dataengineering-plugins
description: Resonate Data Engineering plugins for Claude Code — pipelines, Snowflake, Spark, ETL workflows

plugins.name: deploy-cmr
plugins.description: Create a CMR ticket linked to a work item and notify data-engineering-only Slack channel for prod deployment

plugins.name: sprint-taskgen
plugins.description: Generate milestone-prefixed sub-tasks for every story in a Jira sprint

plugins.name: standup-notes
plugins.description: Generate daily standup notes for Activation and DaaS squads from GitHub, Slack, Jira, Confluence, and PagerDuty

plugins.name: rtp-mcp
plugins.description: Read-only access to the RTP PostgreSQL database — audiences, deliveries, vendors, failed jobs

plugins.name: services-api-mcp
plugins.description: Resonate Services API — audience data, configurations, and delivery resets

plugins.name: meta-mcp
plugins.description: Meta/Facebook Graph API — audience metadata, campaigns, ads, and performance insights

plugins.name: liveramp-mcp
plugins.description: LiveRamp Activation API — segment data and activation status

plugins.name: tiktok-mcp
plugins.description: TikTok Business API — custom audiences and shared audiences
